segments.text: Darling , I have news for you . Bobby and his wife , Evelyn , are going to have a baby soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I thought his wife couldn ’ t have a baby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually they ’ re expecting the baby to come on my birthday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , what a coincidence ! I bet Bobby must be very happy about it . He likes children and always wants a child of his own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In fact , they ’ re both very excited about the coming baby . Evelyn imagines what their baby would be look like , since one parent is American and the other one is Chinese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , right . Now I know why they would want to see our boy . It ’ s hard to imagine the wonder ! Are they expecting a boy or a girl ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s still a mystery . Because Evelyn is only three-month pregnant . But she begins to take her maternity leave now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! You mean she doesn ’ t have to work now ? It ’ s hard for young parents not to overreact , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S2
